text: visvasavantayini! (danamana kirimata adahas kalahot) oba harihambha kala dæyenda, api obata bhumiyehi ikut kala (dhanya, palaturu adi) dæyenda, honda dæyama (danamanaya vasayen) viyadam karanu. evayen narak vu dæya dimata kæmati novanu. (mandayat narak vu bhanda obata keneku laba dunnahot) eva oba (pilikulen yutuva) æs piyavi giya aya vasayen misa, laba ganne næta! (ebævin oba kæmati novana bhanda an ayata danamanaya vasayen nodenu). niyata vasayenma allah vastuva avasya novanneku ha imahat prasamsavata ayat keneku vasayen sitinneya yanna oba sthira vasayen dæna ganu
